name: GTK+
description:
GTK+-2.2 syntax file. This contains xlib.vim, glib.vim, 
pango.vim, gdk.vim and gtk.vim. All deprecated methods are
not highlighted.
install_details:
Make dir $HOME/.vim/after/syntax
untar this file to $HOME/.vim/after/syntax
If you don't have $HOME/.vim/after/syntax/c.vim, then copy  c.vim.example to $HOME/.vim/after/syntax/c.vim

see :h mysyntaxfile-add

versions.release_notes:
Install instruction changed. Now, you need not to change syntax to gtk
If you open c file, automatically highlighted.
Thanks to David Necas (Yeti) <yeti at physics.muni.cz>
